wikipedia_page.main: Cyril Turton (20 September 1921 – January 2000) was an English footballer who played as a centre back for Frickley Colliery and Sheffield Wednesday.

response: Butler joined Sheffield Wednesday as a teenager in September 1952 with the Hillsborough club paying South Bank £300 for his services. After working his way up the ranks in the "A" team and reserves he finally made his first team debut for the Owls on 2 January 1954 at the age of 19. Butler replaced the injured Cyril Turton in a Division One game at home to Burnley; the game finished as a 2–0 win for Wednesday.
